name: The Coding Bull
tagline: We engineer the best lead generating solutions.
description: The Coding Bull is a digital strategy consulting firm that helps SMEs to understand, envision and implement digital as a business strategy. The only objective we have is our clients' businesses growth. As many of our clients can attest, we work with them personally on a weekly basis, respond within minutes, and suggest recommendations on how to grow their business - trying out different tech or making improvements to their business models.
